name: Dash Fleet (itch)
description:
Dash Fleet is a simple and fun tapping and dashing action game.
Make your character dash left or right by tapping, and fly through colorful obstacles.

HOW TO PLAY
You have to tap on the left or right side of screen to make your character dash left or right.
In this adventure you will have to fly through totems, moving rings, sharp saws.
Survive fireballs, thunders and rotating stone blocks.
Collect coins that can help your progress, and earn achievements for a great performance.

Features:
  • Tapping and dashing action game
  • Test your skills and reflexes by avoiding deadly totems, fireballs and stone blocks
  • Multiple playable characters (more to come)
  • Minimalist pixel art design
  • Relaxing music
  • Never ending fun
